hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn 'Abbas that this Verse abrogated the woman's 'Iddah among her family, and she may observe her 'Iddah wherever she wants. That is the saying of Allah, the Mighty and Sublime:without turning them out

chapter.ara-name: باب الرُّخْصَةِ لِلْمُتَوَفَّى عَنْهَا زَوْجُهَا أَنْ تَعْتَدَّ حَيْثُ شَاءَتْ
chapter.eng-name: Concession Allowing A Woman Whose Husband Has Died To Observe Her 'Iddah Wherever She Wants
